title: Instructional Books/Manuals for FontLab?
content: I just got a demo of fontlab and have NO idea how to use it.. I cant seem to find any instructions or information on how to use it.. not even the basics. Anyone know where I might find something? Thanks
author: vwcruisn

comments.content: a pdf manual is available on the FL website

[http://www.fontlab.com/html/fontlab.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017234642/http:/www.fontlab.com/html/fontlab.html)   
   
Here you can find (under Downloads) the complete manual as PDF.   
   
Ren
ouch... 700+ pages... looks like a job for the free laser printer at my school.. heh
